__e: But, please, don't send me there, I'm begging you, please...
And Derek? I'm begging you please, please don't make me wait another night.
- I beg you, please... I swear. I won't do it again.

- I beg you, please... I swear. I won't do it again.
Begging for my life with all my heart.
And if I have done you a wrong then I beg for your forgiveness.
I don't know if Hartmann is still alive, but if he is, for his sake, for everyone's sake, I implore you, help me.
If you learn where he is, I beg you, let me know.
Charles, as a friend, there are questions which I... .. which I beg you not to ask.
Dear God, if You're here and You can hear me,... I ask You, I beg You, don't let Amy die.
Let me do my duty. If you love me, or if you feel anything for me, I beg you, do not tell him. Do it for me.
You must forgive us for coming here to talk about something which has nothing to do with the farm.
I don't know if Hartmann is still alive, but if he is, for his sake, for everyone's sake, I implore you, help me.
And seeing all this, it has just-- it has shown me that there is still so much more to do, so please, I'm begging you to come with me because I cannot do it alone.
Please, I beg you I have nothing please.
There's nothing more for you to do, so I beg you... do nothing.
But, please, don't tell dad what you've just seen.
